label: Task-3
title: Create deployment orchestrator class
description: Build a higher-level orchestrator class that sequences component creation and deletion in dependency order. Creation: IAM -> S3 -> Lambda -> CloudFront. Deletion (reverse): CloudFront -> Lambda -> S3 -> IAM. Each step calls create() then verify(). Orchestrator reports success/failure for each component. Supports partial deployment (e.g., skip CloudFront if not needed).

properties.acceptance_criteria: Orchestrator deploys full stack (IAM + S3 + Lambda) in correct order. Orchestrator destroys full stack in reverse order. Full round-trip integration test passes.
